members.name: bidirectional
members.descriptionHtml: React to all arrows.

members.name: horizontal
members.descriptionHtml: Only react to left/right arrows.

members.name: vertical
members.descriptionHtml: Only react to up/down arrows.

members.name: focus
members.descriptionHtml: Sets focus to the first tabbable item in the zone.

members.name: focusElement
members.descriptionHtml: Sets focus to a specific child element within the zone. This can be used in conjunction with onBeforeFocus to created delayed focus scenarios (like animate the scroll position to the correct location and then focus.)

members.name: allowFocusRoot
members.descriptionHtml: Allow focus to move to root

members.name: allowTabKey
members.descriptionHtml: Allows tab key to be handled to tab through a list of items in the focus zone, an unfortunate side effect is that users will not be able to tab out of the focus zone and have to hit escape or some other key.

members.name: ariaDescribedBy
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the aria-describedby attribute.

members.name: ariaLabelledBy
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the aria-labelledby attribute.

members.name: as
members.descriptionHtml: A component that should be used as the root element of the FocusZone component.

members.name: checkForNoWrap
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the to check for data-no-horizontal-wrap or data-no-vertical-wrap attributes when determining how to move focus

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Additional class name to provide on the root element, in addition to the ms-FocusZone class.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IFocusZone interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: defaultActiveElement
members.descriptionHtml: Optionally provide a selector for identifying the intial active element.

members.name: direction
members.descriptionHtml: Defines which arrows to react to.

members.name: disabled
members.descriptionHtml: If set, the FocusZone will not be tabbable and keyboard navigation will be disabled. This does not affect disabled attribute of any child.

members.name: doNotAllowFocusEventToPropagate
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the FocusZone should allow focus events to propagate past the FocusZone

members.name: elementType
members.descriptionHtml: Element type the root element will use. Default is "div".

members.name: handleTabKey
members.descriptionHtml: Allows tab key to be handled to tab through a list of items in the focus zone, an unfortunate side effect is that users will not be able to tab out of the focus zone and have to hit escape or some other key.

members.name: isCircularNavigation
members.descriptionHtml: If set, will cycle to the beginning of the targets once the user navigates to the next target while at the end, and to the end when navigate to the previous at the beginning.

members.name: isInnerZoneKeystroke
members.descriptionHtml: If provided, this callback will be executed on keypresses to determine if the user intends to navigate into the inner zone. Returning true will ask the first inner zone to set focus.

members.name: onActiveElementChanged
members.descriptionHtml: Callback for when one of immediate children elements gets active by getting focused or by having one of its respective children elements focused.

members.name: onBeforeFocus
members.descriptionHtml: Callback method for determining if focus should indeed be set on the given element.

members.name: onFocusNotification
members.descriptionHtml: Callback to notify creators that focus has been set on the FocusZone

members.name: rootProps
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated at v1.12.1. DIV props provided to the FocusZone will be mixed into the root element.

members.name: shouldInputLoseFocusOnArrowKey
members.descriptionHtml: A callback method to determine if the input element should lose focus on arrow keys
